item.title: REVEALED: Salman Khan features as Agent Bhai Jaan in a ROCKING cameo in Baby John - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Salman Khan Shines as Agent Bhai Jaan in Baby John Cameo

Publication Date: December 25, 2024 | Source: Bollywood Hungama

The highly anticipated film Baby John was released today, featuring a much-talked-about cameo by superstar Salman Khan as Agent Bhai Jaan, which is expected to delight fans.

  • The film has generated significant excitement with its mass appeal and star-studded cast.
  • Salman Khan's cameo adds a fun twist, showcasing both action and comedy.
  • This marks Salman’s second cameo appearance in two months, following his brief role in Singham Again.
  • Producer Murad Khetani revealed that Salman agreed to the cameo in under 10 seconds during their discussion.
  • Salman's birthday is just two days away, coinciding with the film’s release and a teaser for his upcoming film Sikandar.
“Atlee informed me about the requirement for a star for a cameo... it took me an hour to gather the courage to ask him. Finally, I told him... He replied, ‘Yes, done.’” - Murad Khetani

Salman Khan's cameo in Baby John promises to be a treat for fans, aligning with the festive spirit and drawing attention to his upcoming works.

item.title: Pushpa 2 The Rule worldwide box office collection Day 20: Allu Arjun film hunts down Baahubali 2, Dangal records; breaks Rs 1600 cr barrier - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 The Rule worldwide box office collection Day 20

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Indian Express

Director Sukumar’s blockbuster Telugu-language film, Pushpa 2: The Rule, has been on a record-breaking spree since its release last month, maintaining strong performance despite competition.

  • On its 20th day, Pushpa 2 collected Rs 14.2 crore in India.
  • The film surpassed Rs 700 crore in lifetime nett collections, becoming the highest-earning Hindi film ever.
  • Globally, Pushpa 2 has crossed the Rs 1600 crore mark.
  • It is now the third-biggest Indian film of all time, following Baahubali 2 and Dangal.
  • Most revenue has come from the Hindi version, with significant earnings from China.
  • The film's success has been overshadowed by a tragic incident during a screening.
"Pushpa 2 has now passed the Rs 1600 crore mark, making it the third-biggest Indian film of all time."

In conclusion, Pushpa 2's success at the box office is remarkable but is complicated by the controversies surrounding its screenings and the star's involvement in recent incidents.

item.title: 3 Idiots turn 15: Omi Vaidya aka Chatur gave up role in How I Met Your Mother for audition of Aamir Khan film, was pranked by Rajkumar Hirani - The Indian Express
item.description:
Omi Vaidya Reflects on 15 Years of 3 Idiots

Date: November 30, 2023 | Source: Indian Express

Omi Vaidya, known for his role as Chatur in the iconic film '3 Idiots', shares his experiences on the film's 15th anniversary, discussing his early auditions and memorable moments from filming.

  • Vaidya recalls his surprise at the film's enduring popularity, stating, "Movies keep coming and going, but not with this one. I always knew it would be a good film, but never thought it would resonate with the audience 15 years later."
  • He initially had little interest in Indian cinema, having only seen a few Hindi films.
  • Vaidya chose to audition for '3 Idiots' after encouragement from a friend, despite focusing on his Hollywood career.
  • He had to turn down a role in 'How I Met Your Mother' for his '3 Idiots' audition.
  • Directorial pranks from Rajkumar Hirani made the filming experience memorable.
Omi Vaidya said, "I had to give up that very good call for HIMYM... I lost out on a lot of stuff here because of that."

Reflecting on his role and the impact of his character, Vaidya emphasizes the significance of the humor and genuine connections made on set. He appreciates the collaborative atmosphere fostered by Hirani and how Khan's involvement shaped the film's quality.

item.title: Boy injured in 'Pushpa-2' stampede responds after 20 days - The Times of India
item.description:
Boy injured in 'Pushpa-2' stampede responds after 20 days

Publication Date: [insert_date_here]

Source: [insert_source_here]

After 20 days of hospitalization, a boy injured in the 'Pushpa-2' movie stampede has shown signs of recovery.

  • The incident occurred during a promotional event for the film.
  • Emergency services faced challenges reaching the injured.
  • Authorities are investigating the overcrowding issue at the event.
"We are relieved to see his progression, but the event should have been managed better." - Parent of the injured boy

The recovery of the injured boy raises questions about event management and safety protocols in crowded venues.

item.title: 'Pushpa 2' box office collection day 20: The Allu Arjun starrer is unstoppable as it makes Rs 14.25 crore - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Hits New Record with Rs 14.25 Crore on Day 20

Publication Date: [Insert Date] | Source: [Insert Source]

The Allu Arjun starrer 'Pushpa 2' continues to dominate the box office, amassing Rs 14.25 crore on its 20th day, making it the highest-grossing Indian movie ever.

  • The film has shown remarkable consistency in earnings.
  • On day 20, it achieved a significant milestone with daily collections of Rs 14.25 crore.
  • 'Pushpa 2' has surpassed previous Indian box office records.
  • Strong audience reception has contributed to its success.
“Pushpa 2 is unstoppable!”

This event marks a significant achievement in Indian cinema, showcasing the film's widespread popularity and the potential for future milestones in box office collections.

item.title: Singham Again suddenly disappears from Amazon Prime Video – What happened? - 123telugu
item.description:
Singham Again Disappears from Amazon Prime Video – What Happened?

Published on Dec 25, 2024 | Source: 123telugu.com

Singham Again, the latest film in Rohit Shetty's cop universe, has unexpectedly been removed from Amazon Prime Video despite plans for it to become free-to-stream soon. The sudden disappearance has left fans in suspense as they await an explanation.

  • The film features a star-studded cast including Ajay Devgn, Akshay Kumar, and Salman Khan.
  • It was initially available for rent, with expectations of being available for free by December 29, 2024.
  • The reason for its removal remains unclear, prompting questions from the audience.
  • Produced by notable companies such as Reliance Entertainment and Jio Studios, the film is known for its high-octane action and a powerful soundtrack.
“The sudden disappearance remains unclear, and audiences are eagerly awaiting an official explanation from Amazon Prime Video.”

As fans await clarification, the situation highlights the unpredictability of content availability on streaming platforms.

item.title: Arbaaz Khan shares adorable pics with wife Sshura Khan on first wedding anniversary: ‘Feels like I’ve known you forever' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Arbaaz Khan Celebrates First Wedding Anniversary with Sshura Khan

Date: Dec 25, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Bollywood actor Arbaaz Khan celebrated his first wedding anniversary with his wife, Sshura Khan, sharing heartfelt photos and messages on social media.

  • Arbaaz shared two beautiful pictures to commemorate their special day.
  • The couple's first photo features them dressed in elegant black outfits, while the second reflects their wedding day joy.
  • He expressed his love, stating, "Words can't express the happiness, joy and laughter you bring to our lives... it feels I've known you forever."
  • Sshura Khan also shared her gratitude, calling Arbaaz her "safe haven" and expressing her love for him.
  • The couple received congratulatory messages from fans and friends, celebrating their love.
“Happy Anniversary Arbaazzz. My love, every day with you feels like a blessing.” - Sshura Khan

This celebration marks a joyful milestone for the couple, who married on December 24, 2023, after a year of dating.

item.title: Horoscope Today: Astrological prediction December 25, 2024 for all zodiac signs - India Today
item.description:
Daily Horoscope: Astrological Prediction for December 25, 2024

Published On: Dec 25, 2024

This daily horoscope provides insights into love, health, money, and career for all zodiac signs. Find predictions tailored to your Sun sign below.

  • Aries: Positive developments in business, stability in relationships, increased confidence. Lucky numbers: 7, 9. Lucky colour: Brown.
  • Taurus: Job performance aligns with expectations, caution in finances, effective communication. Lucky numbers: 5, 6, 7, 9. Lucky colour: Silver.
  • Gemini: Improvement in working conditions, boost from friends, increased focus on education. Lucky numbers: 5, 7. Lucky colour: Light Green.
  • Cancer: Focus on family harmony, patience in emotional matters, potential property acquisition. Lucky numbers: 2, 5, 7, 9. Lucky colour: Aqua.
  • Leo: Strength in business expansion, good news, and strong social relations. Lucky numbers: 1, 5, 7, 9. Lucky colour: Purple.
  • Virgo: Joy in family, growth in reputation, interest in conservation efforts. Lucky numbers: 5, 7, 8. Lucky colour: Dark Green.
  • Libra: Positive personal relationships, important decision-making, and heightened creativity. Lucky numbers: 5, 6, 7, 9. Lucky colour: Yellow.
  • Scorpio: Focus on budgets and expenses, trust your efforts for timely task completion. Lucky numbers: 7, 9. Lucky colour: Brown.
  • Sagittarius: Acceleration of financial tasks, reputation growth, strong support from friends. Lucky colour: 3, 7, 9.
  • Capricorn: Excellent relationships with authority, profitable career, and business endeavors. Lucky numbers: 5, 7, 8, 9. Lucky colour: Red.
  • Aquarius: Quick action on opportunities, increase in faith, and possible involvement in spiritual activities. Lucky numbers: 5, 7, 8, 9. Lucky colour: Purple.
  • Pisces: Focus on simplicity and balance, health considerations, cautious financial management. Lucky numbers: 3, 6, 7, 9. Lucky colour: Olive.

item.title: Three Korean Actors Crowned For 2024’s “Worst Acting” By Industry Insiders - Koreaboo
item.description:
Three Korean Actors Crowned For 2024's 'Worst Acting' By Industry Insiders

Date: December 24, 2024 | Source: Sports Kyunghyang

Korean media outlet Sports Kyunghyang has released the 8th Sanddalki Awards, identifying the “worst actors” in Korean cinema for 2024.

  • 1. Kang Dong Won: Received 11 votes for his performance in The Plot, criticized for insufficient acting.
  • 2. “None Of The Above:” 10 votes indicating that no actor was worthy of second place.
  • 3. Ju Ji Hoon: Rated third for Project Silence, accused of over-acting by eight panelists.
  • 4. Tied: Song Joong Ki and Song Seung Hun: Each received seven votes, for their roles in My Name Is Loh Kiwan and Hidden Face, respectively.

The awards highlight the perceptions of industry insiders regarding acting failures this year.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: BB exposes Rajat Dalal in front of the entire house; plays audio calling Avinash Mishra 'th - The Times of India
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: BB Exposes Rajat Dalal in Front of Entire House

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

In an intense moment on Bigg Boss 18, Rajat Dalal was exposed for calling Avinash Mishra 'tharki' through an audio recording played in front of the housemates.

  • Rajat Dalal's derogatory remarks were revealed to everyone in the house.
  • The recording featured Rajat referring to Avinash inappropriately.
  • Avinash responded with disbelief, questioning Rajat's earlier claims of considering Eisha as a sister.
“Eisha ko toh tu behan maanta hai na..” - Avinash Mishra

This incident showcases the ongoing drama and interpersonal conflicts within the Bigg Boss house, further escalating tensions among the contestants.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Avinash Mishra Betrays Vivian Dsena & Eisha Singh, Forms Unexpected Alliance With Karan Veer Mehra ! - News24
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: Avinash Mishra Betrays Vivian Dsena & Eisha Singh, Forms Unexpected Alliance With Karan Veer Mehra!

Publication Date: Dec 24, 2024 Source: News24

The latest episode of Bigg Boss 18 features intense drama following the mid-eviction of Digvijay Rathee and the elimination of Edin Rose and Yamini Malhotra. Contestant Avinash Mishra has formed a surprising alliance with Karan Veer Mehra, leaving his friends Eisha Singh and Vivian Dsena taken aback.

Key Points:

  • Avinash's strategic shift after mid-evictions shakes the house dynamics.
  • Emotional reactions from contestants like Sara and Kashish following Edin and Yamini's eviction.
  • Avinash discusses his game plan with Karan and how he aims to eliminate competitors.
  • Insights from Avinash about his observations on Karan's behavior.
“After all these days, Edin was the only one who I felt was the best person in the house.” - Kashish Kapoor
“Right now, he’s playing with his mind, and it’s important for me to catch that.” - Avinash Mishra

This episode has set the stage for potential alliances and rivalries in the remaining weeks of the competition, suggesting that the game is only heating up.

item.title: Vivek Oberoi opens up about heartbreak, self reflection; Says, 'Bollywood is responsible for it partially - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Vivek Oberoi Reflects on Heartbreak and Self-Discovery in the Shadow of Bollywood

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Times of India

Actor Vivek Oberoi shares his experiences with heartbreak and the emotional lessons learned from it, particularly addressing how Bollywood's culture plays a role in shaping reactions to personal trauma.

  • Oberoi emphasizes the unhealthy emotional responses men exhibit after breakups, including feelings of betrayal and self-neglect.
  • He criticizes the tendency to lose one's self-identity post-relationship and the superficial ways of coping, influenced partly by Bollywood narratives.
  • His own journey included struggling with negative emotions for years until finding love again with Priyanka.
  • Vivek encourages introspection and self-care, advising men to recognize their worth and protect themselves in relationships.
“This girl left you, and you let her take your sense of self along with her. That’s wrong.” - Vivek Oberoi

The conversation underscores the importance of self-awareness and healing after emotional distress, advocating for personal growth over temporary distractions.

item.title: Koratala Siva Starts Work on 'Devara 2'.. - Greatandhra
item.description:
Koratala Siva Starts Work on 'Devara 2'

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Not specified

After its debut on OTT, Devara faced significant trolling, with social media flooded with memes mocking Koratala Siva's formulaic writing and unrealistic action sequences. Despite the backlash, Siva is optimistic about the sequel, already commencing scripting work and planning to take the project to sets next year.

  • Devara attracted criticism for its narrative and action sequences.
  • Koratala Siva remains confident about the sequel's potential.
  • Financial disputes need to be resolved before proceeding with production.
  • Other successful sequels in Bollywood have sparked optimism for Devara 2.
“Siva believes Devara 2 can achieve similar success, despite the online criticism.”

The confidence displayed by Siva suggests that he may steer the narrative of Devara 2 to surpass its predecessor’s reception.

item.title: Netflix’s Monday Night RAW Will Stick to Three-Hour Format - Ringside News
item.description:
Netflix’s Monday Night RAW Will Stick to Three-Hour Format

Date: December 24, 2024
Source: Ringside News

WWE’s flagship show, Monday Night Raw, is set to debut on Netflix on January 6, 2025, featuring a stacked lineup including Liv Morgan defending her championship and matches involving Roman Reigns and CM Punk.

  • Raw will maintain its traditional three-hour format starting in January.
  • This decision is confirmed by wrestling journalist Dave Meltzer, citing a key WWE player.
  • The shift to Netflix will eventually allow WWE more creative freedom but current international TV deals limit this for now.
  • Fans can expect consistent three-hour programming until existing broadcast agreements conclude.
“Raw will still be on television in India for a couple months, Germany, the Philippines, and Japan… until those TV deals go away.” - Dave Meltzer

The return to a three-hour format is part of WWE's overall strategy, coinciding with SmackDown also expanding to three hours in January 2025.

item.title: Blake Lively names her and Ryan Reynold's kids in lawsuit against Justin Baldoni: Here's why - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Blake Lively Names Kids in Lawsuit Against Justin Baldoni

Date: December 24, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Blake Lively has initiated a lawsuit against Justin Baldoni, alleging negligence related to on-set COVID-19 exposure, which affected her and her infant son. She claims that Baldoni failed to inform her of the exposure and that the production lacked proper safety measures.

  • Lively's lawsuit includes her children's names as she claims they were also affected by COVID-19.
  • She alleges that Baldoni withheld information regarding her exposure to the virus which led to her contraction.
  • There were no insurance provisions for COVID-related delays, adding to the issues Lively faced during production.
  • She has expressed frustration over safety concerns not being addressed and has outlined conditions for returning to the set.
“Ms Lively was told by another producer that Wayfarer did not have insurance coverage for COVID,” the documents state.

In conclusion, this lawsuit not only highlights the personal challenges Lively has faced but also raises concerns about safety protocols in film production in light of the ongoing pandemic.
